今の環境は参加しないほうがいいですね。初心者にはつらいです。
・キラー側が多数弱体化された。初心者にはつらい
・サバイバーは強化されたが、ある要素がとびぬけて強くなったせいで知識がないとそれを妨害する可能性があり、
　知らないと非難されるかもしれない。
・相変わらずバグ多数。不快なるバグもあり。

Ive played this game for longer than what it says, first started out on ps4 for a few years and got out of it but apon coming back im enjoying it again and highly recommend this game with friends. playing it alone can be boring but its still worth it

Мертвая игра живёт на комюинити долбоебов которые играют онли на сурвах. 90% игроков даже не понимаю как хуёво играется на манах и пиздят, за частую заходя на профили таких людей можно увидить 1000+ часов за спиной и возникает 2 вопроса: сколько iq у данного человека и не заебало ли его врать самому себе что на сурвах сложно играть. Токсичность основная часть этой игры, 4 чела в пати(не пати не важно о об этом позже) с 16 перками играют против 1 игрока с 4 перками на не факт что открытой карте(и даже они не все играбельны) понимаете того насколько у тебя преимущество должно быть но нет даже так люди боди дебают, щелкают фонарями и чето в чат выписываете вы кто блять вы кто такие нахуй долбоебы кто вас родил конченые кто вас воспитал олени безмозглые. Баланса как вы поняли в игре нет, но помимо того что было расплывчата сказано раньше так эти долбоебы на бухувер умудрились сделать так что даже абилки манов вменяемо не работают и не факт что будут(тут объяснять не буду хотите тестите минимум каток по 20 на мана что бы понять боль его абилки). Звуки в игре более менее, НООООО есть перк на сурвов который отключает им крики полностью как тебе такое илон маск. 
В общем и целом говно! Хотите быть токсичным безмозглым долбоебом добро пожаловать хуесос, а если хотите нормально поиграть лучше ищите другую сесионку это полный мусор

Игра крутая, наблюдаю за ней с 2017 года. Есть много минусов (баги пока на себе не проверял): Сказали что пофиксили хиты, но тебя так же продолжают пробивать за метр, может и два, и новое обновление. В обновлении мы видим цирк. Так как я сурвмейнер я захотел приобрести сурва и так как было выгоднее брать длс, я еще и приобрел маньяка. Маньяк скажу честно, просто имба, а вот перки сурва - бесполезны! Так еще и костюмы у них, я понимаю это может нравится токсикам в игре, но игра по жанру "хоррор,насилие,экшен, мясо" А НЕ ЭТА КЛОУНАДА! Так как обновление полная фигня, ставлю диз.

***TLDR: Don't buy this game unless you want to sink hundreds of hours into a buggy game to receive nothing back that rewards your time spent, where the developers don't listen to the fans, and just want you to spend money on cosmetics. You're better off spending your money on DBD 2 when that comes out since this game is getting outdated real fast, and doesn't do well comparatively to other online multiplayer games, especially with the amount of hacking outright ruining games.

     Dead by Daylight (DBD) is an interesting game at its premise that fills a niche that not many games fill today in such a developed state. Perhaps it is due to the amount of time since it's release, or maybe the passion that the developers have for the game, but passion alone does not lead to a worthwhile product. The developers are slow to fix bugs in the game from audio, to visual or even to ones that affect game play. The sole exception to this is when there is a game breaking bug, which is to be the bare minimum for all multiplayer games. There are audio bugs where music cuts in and out for killer since their 4th year anniversary, a game play bug where if the killer swings with M1, a survivor might stop and do the picked up animation for no reason, or even ones where survivors might somehow get stuck "inside" a locker but cannot be removed by any means. Three examples is good enough; moving on. Let me mention that there is also a "known bugs" list included in the patch notes, that they haven't fixed, filled with more examples.
     With the release of the newest chapter/DLC at the time of writing this being the All-Kill one there have been many gripes from the fans of the game, including content creators that have fallen on deaf ears. The killer in this chapter, "The Trickster" is much weaker than say some of the other killers, to the point that with players that have reached high rank, the killer will lose. However, this was not unexpected, as when the chapter came out on PTB, many people took note, yet instead the developers made him weaker, by removing the add-ons that made him better. We can use this to infer that the developers do not listen to fans, and just add in or change features that they THINK we as the player base would like (noises with flashlights from survivor side when the killer is blinded, and more graphics when you as the killer are blinded are other examples). After the release of the Twins, and all the bugs that came with it, I think I can speak for many people when I say that we probably expected more from the developers, in terms of quality of life changes. 
     The developers have even repeatedly pushed for an ELO system dispite their first attempt absolutely failing, while also failing to understand that only few killers are genuinely viable in higher ranks. What constitutes something as viable though? Well, since the game doesn't clearly define what a win is, it is whatever you want it to be! This is incredibly arbitrary and thus you might get toxic killers who face camp one survivor if that is their goal or survivors who actively chase after the killer and point out other survivors. The implementation of this "advanced" matchmaking system is likely a push to become a more relevant competitive game, when for this to work you need to have the killers each be capable on their own, with a static winning condition.
     Something I think that DBD also ignores is rewarding the player for improving and getting better at the game. There still is not any seasonal rewards, as they had hinted at from [earliest forum post I could find was] Oct 2019, which was later confirmed to be an inconsequential amount of blood points, but nothing of substance. What happened to old games where if I poured time into a game I could unlock cool cosmetics that couldn't be bought? Answer: Companies can put cosmetics behind a paywall that forces you to play to get the things you want, to keep a player base. Let's also take a look at the price of cosmetics or characters, where all of them can be purchased with in cash transactions, yet the premium earned currency, Iridescent Shards, cannot be used to purchase some survivors, killers, or even cosmetics. The price of Iridescent shards to buy some cosmetic sets is more than what it costs to even buy the killer, which alone already took dozens of hours to grind and save up for. This kind of model is ultimately counter-intuitive to casual players who maybe just want to play a few games a night after getting home from work.
     Now I get it, I sank +1000 hours into the game so it can't be that bad right? that's true, but I tend to think of this game as a ship with holes in the hull, which are either slightly fixed or ignored. What happens to the ship though? well it eventually sinks and likely remains at the ocean floor. The developers might have made the game work well up to a point, but with the current state, I wouldn't be too shocked to hear that they are starting or even have started development on a DBD 2, with a whole new engine, with a MUCH better anti-cheating system (I think mentioning this alone makes the point self-explanatory).

                                                                   DON'T BUY THIS GAME!

The concept is good but the game itself is not. Gameplay is ALWAYS broken, and trust me, I have been playing this for years. It's always full of bugs, exploits and Dead by Daylight got one of the most toxic communities to play with(at least in my country, not sure if that is worldwide).

Besides that, the game get really repetitive after sometime. Also, if you want to play as a killer, you'll face another problem: Survive With Friends(SWF) groups. The game is about the lack of communication, especially since you DON'T HAVE an in-game chat to communicate with other players as the match goes on. But some people doesn't seem to get this... and exploit the surviving mechanics with voice communication on discord, teamspeak, etc. That sucks, for real. Players on the other side of the map will be aware of what you're doing as a killer even without seeing you, just bcse someone is telling them by voice, wich totally breaks the atmosphere of non-communication the game offers. And as survivor, if you are fine with really shitty hitboxes where killers can land hits on you, even if they ACTUALLY didn't touch you AT ALL, well... if you're fine with that then this is your game! 

If I could resume Dead by Daylight in a few topics, it would be:

PROS
- Fun to play casually with friends without taking it too serious.
- You can play as some cool killers you might be obsessed with if you're a horror movie fan.

CONS
- Sucks to play as killer, survivors can AND will exploit communications if they are playing with friends.
- Totally innacurate hitboxes(for real).
- Matchmaking sucks. Players with bad ranks face players with high ranks all the time.
- Lots of bugs and exploits.

In resume: If you want to play as a killer and take this game seriously, DON'T BUY THIS. But if you don't take it serious at all, give it a chance when it's on sale. If you want to play as survivor, I suggest you to get this on sale as well, a good one. But be warned! Lots of bugs, toxic players, unbalanced mechanics and constant suffering are in your future.

Do I like this game? Not anymore, used to. Do I recommend this game? Not anymore, used to. IMO if you can buy DBD you should spend your money on something better.

Dead By Daylight-неплохая выживалка для коопа с друзьями,но также не особо оптимизирована,игра даже для 2016 года довольно мыльная,это конечно не Мафия 3,но мыло всё равно пресудствует,но если не обращать внимание на мыло и немного деревянное управление,то игра довольно неплохая,большой выбор выживших и маньяков и у того и у того класса есть перки помогающие при игре,отличная игра для коопа,взял по скидке за 200 рублей,отличная цена,моя оценка Dead By Daylight-8/10

230 Saat vakit geçirdim ve yaklaşık 60 saatte uğraşarak solo rank 2 kademe 3 hayatta kalan derecesi gördüm, düşüncelerimi belirtip insanların kafasında oyunla alakalı fikir oluşturmak istiyorum. Baştan aşağı mind game içeren bir kovalamaca oyunu kendisi, iyi oynamak tamamen tecrübe istediği için bolca oynamalı, oyunu bilen insanları izlemeli ve izlerken boş boş bakmak yerine gerçekten nasıl yakaladığını/kaçtığını öğrenmelisiniz. Genelde oyunu satın alan insanlar bu oyuna başladıklarında zorluk ve alışma süreçleri diğer oyunlara kıyasla daha uzun sürüyor, bunun sebebi kendi kanaatimce geçmişte böyle bir yapıma benzer bir şeye vakit harcamamış olmamız. Oyunun iyi yanlarını ve kötü yanlarını karşılaştırırsak: Oyunda fazlasıyla eğlenebiliyorsunuz fakat eğlenebilmek için oyunu gerçekten öğrenmeniz gerekiyor (5 kişilik arkadaş grubu ile oynamadığınızı varsayıyorum) ve bu vakit gerektiriyor. Katil ve hayatta kalan tarafında ''perk'' denilen Türkçe çevirisi ''avantaj'' olan şeylere sahibiz, bunlar oyun stilimizi ve oynayış tarzımızı tamamen değiştirmeye odaklayıp, oyundan alınan keyfi sanki başka bir oyun oynuyormuş gibi hissettirmesi ile ön plana çıkıyor. Bu bahsi geçen avantajları açmak içinse yeni katil ya da hayatta kalan açmak (çoğu seviye atlayıp oyun parası ile açılabiliyor) ve ardından her maç başı kazandığımız kan puanlarını bu karakterlere yatırmak belirli seviyelere ulaştırmak gerekiyor, ve bu gerçekten ve gerçekten çok zaman istiyor. Oyunda buglar var, 1 metre öteden hit yeme var, sunucuları sadece NA tarafında olduğu için Türkiye'den bağlanıyorsanız pinginizin 80 civarı olması çok yüksek, oyunda ''Avcı'' isimli katil balta fırlatıyor ve oyunun hitboxları inanılmaz kötü olduğu için çok saçma sapan şekilde hit yiyebiliyorsunuz (bunu özellikle buraya ekledim çünkü inanılmaz sinir bozucu bir durum) ayrıca oyunda ''Dead Hard'' isimli Türkçesi ''Kum Torbası'' olan bir avantaj sayesinde kısa bir ileri atılma ile katilden uzaklaşıp bir hitinden sıyrılma imkanını elde edebiliyorsunuz ve bu avantajın açıklamasında özellikle şöyle yazıyor: ''EYLEM SIRASINDA HASAR ALMAZSINIZ'' bu açıklamaya rağmen kum torbası sırasında çoğunlukla hasar alıyorsunuz, belki de oyunu 80 70 pingten aşağıda oynayamadığım için başıma geliyordur. Kısaca oyunu öneriyorum ama almak gibi bir düşünceniz varsa oyuna fazlasıyla saat harcamadan eğlenemeyeceğinizi bilmelisiniz, tabii yukarıda açtığım parantez gibi 5 kişilik arkadaş ortamı varsa herkes oyunu bilmediği için o durumda gayet eğlenilebiliyor.
Oynamak isteyenler ekleyebilirler memnuniyetle tanışırım :)

The game itself is fun. If you are reading this edit then know the game is fun. DO NOT post on the forums as it is "school" rules. Basically that means is whoever gets to the teacher first, wins. If you even try to add light to a post by telling someone that they need to take a poo, which would in then turn to say is to make light of the situation and after speaking perspective on an old saying, you get banned. The community is toxic in game and just as bad here and on Reddit so avoid at all possible. Discord is your best bet if you do not find a few decent people while in a match but good luck with that as solo survivor from rank 20-5 are a joke. Did you buy to play killer, so did I. Best/worst gaming choice in my life. Once you start being at least an adept, here come S.urvive W.ith F.riends teams to make you into a joke. So now you either have to choose. Grind for hours to learn the game, hope you have a skill for it if you do not already, maybe find a killer that works well with your play style if you have not already, or be smart and STAY AWAY! lol BTW this is with creeping up to or over I think 3k hours spent in game so take that as you will.

Great concept of a game. I love being a killer at least for now. Downsides are that some killers cost gold which is obtained through spending money on the game. As a survivor, it seems kind of boring to be repairing generators all the time which is why I like playing as a killer. The worst part is bad matchmaking, which is from huge differences in ranks to waiting several minutes just to get in a game. This game is very unique with some downsides but im glad I found it because games like these I will be playing a lot in the future.
